name: Save The Boron Beta 1.0
description:
THANKS FOR +120 DOWNLOADING(wow)

BETA 1.0 IS OUT!!!! (recommended resoulution is 1920x1080)

You are a student,and you have to help your school from scientists and teachers that wants to steal boron!And you are the last hope of school.What would you rather?

Save The Boron,or help them?

The parkour based "Platformer" game,but maybe it contains a backstory,who knows?

If you've found a bug,you can email to: gurkansteamacc@gmail.com.Thanks for your interest.If you have an idea -it doesnt matter if its good or if it is bad- you can share it! 

a gürkna game.

CONTROLS

Go Left:A   

Go Right:D

Jump:Space

Return to Main Menu while playing any level:ESC
